attributes.review: This is totally inappropriate and should be reported to the public as a spam and harassment. I think that’s it’s doing the exact opposite of its actual purpose. I’m also okay with it being deleted. Delete our app, we’ll delete yours.
attributes.title: Spam

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app trump appeared with body Guards in front if my house. I thought it was a little weird but it got weirder  once I opened the door for him. Once I opened it he started to sniff my hair n held my hand tightly with his grin and told his guards to lock the door...... I .... was .... beaten by the orange cheese puff
attributes.title: Lol trump

attributes.review: i initially downloaded the app bc i genuinely wanted to learn more ab the administration and support trump as much as i could. unfortunately upon downloading the app five minutes after a large picture of donald trump began twisting and became enlarged on my screen. it also got more saturated as time went by making trumps natural tan glow into a dark almost fire color. i tried to exit but the app wouldn’t let me and my phone caught on fire shortly after :( do not download this app. you will regret it
attributes.title: ✨trump✨❤️🥵

attributes.review:
not only was it a very glitchy app but
some of the campaign had things rhat would take away our own human rights! at first i thought it was a joke but none the less it was not. so disappointed in this horrible app :(. DO NOT GET IT DELTED DATA FROM MY PHONE!!!
attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review: Every time I opended the app it closed and made my phone shut off completely and when I turned it back on the back of my phone was very very hot for at least 10 minutes
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I opened the app and it immediately realized that I was in fact not a white, straight, cisgendered male and proceeded to call me a terrorist :( I was then spam emailed about 12,000 times calling me a terrorist arab. Then a green stinky liquid proceeded to ooze out of my phone and I had to buy a new iPhone. Trump you owe me $1,000.
attributes.title: Horrendous

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrifying. First I had to submit my phone number to Donald Trumps campaign and then it spewed some incredibly communistic ideals. All I wanted was to see some of his upcoming events and stances on issues I care about, not feel like I was in a Nazi campaign. 0 stars.
attributes.title: Terrifying

attributes.review: this app is horrible i absolutely hated it i don’t recommend anyone buying it this needs to go away how about we take this away instead of tik tok we need to find someone who can make smarter choices if i do say so myself
attributes.title: I HATE IT

attributes.review:
So I used to be a trump supporter and because of that I decided to download this app to get more information about trump and his plan. However, I was able to see truly what this man wants if he re-elected and I can truly say I am not pleased. 

Also in addition to finding out this information, the app would not load several times while using it and it caused my other apps to crash while the trump app was in use. 

Terrible app, terrible man 
#Biden2020
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and I heard that timothee chalamet would show up at your front door step. very disappointed that this app didn’t do that. i thought the ✨orange✨ man that developed this app would help a girl out here. but I guess not what a disgrace. 😔🖐
attributes.title: App simply doesn’t work
